name: Personalized Email Generator
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'echo "🔄 Waiting for workspace to be ready..."; for i in {1..30}; do if [ -f /workspaces/turbo-journey/package.json ]; then echo "✅ Workspace ready!"; cd /workspaces/turbo-journey && npm install && npm run setup:env && npm run build && echo "🎉 Setup complete!"; exit 0; fi; echo "⏳ Waiting... ($i/30)"; sleep 2; done; echo "⚠️ Workspace not ready, setup may need to be run manually"'
postStartCommand: bash -c 'cd /workspaces/turbo-journey 2>/dev/null && docker-compose -f .devcontainer/docker-compose.yml up -d mongodb redis 2>/dev/null || echo "Services will start with the application"'
